name: Rabbids Go Home
summary: Rabbids Go Home was released on PC in select countries in Europe, notable France (in which it was published by Mindscape), Russia (Бука), Czech Republic (Playman), Germany (Computer Bild Spiele). It was developed by Ubisoft Sofia. Much of the content from the original Wii version is absent from this version, such as the In Ze Remote features and the Centre City. Only 16 levels are present in the game. Polish port was split into 4 parts (one contains 4 levels, totally 16). It was sold with the magazine (which truly was only a front cover) issued every two months with disc and Rabbid figure. The publisher was Egmont Polska.
